name: Booklaunch.io for WordPress
author: The Booklaunch Team

sections.description:
Installation & Use

  1. Download
  2. Unzip the folder and drag it into your WordPress wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Navigate to Plugins in your wp-admin dashboard
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Add a new page in WordPress
  6. Under Page Attributes in the righthand sidebar, set the Template as Booklaunch page
  7. A meta box titled Booklaunch Page Options will be added
  8. Paste your Booklaunch page URL into the input field. For example, https://booklaunch.io/scottrodgers/onedecisionbook
  9. Publish the WordPress page and share your new Booklaunch URL.

Requirements

This plugin requires WordPress’ “Custom Page Template” feature to work normally. This core feature is enabled by standard in 99% of WordPress themes, however, some themes (like Thesis) disable this functionality and are not compatible with the Booklaunch.io plugin.

Contact

Need help? Experiencing issues? Email us any time at help@booklaunch.io

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download
  2. Unzip the folder and drag it into your WordPress wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Navigate to Plugins in your wp-admin dashboard
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Add a new page in WordPress
  6. Under Page Attributes in the righthand sidebar, set the Template as Booklaunch page
  7. A meta box titled Booklaunch Page Options will be added
  8. Paste your Booklaunch page URL into the input field. For example, https://booklaunch.io/scottrodgers/onedecisionbook
  9. Publish the WordPress page and share your new Booklaunch URL.

Why won’t my Booklaunch page display properly?

In order for the plugin to work, you must be a Premium Booklaunch.io user.

Why don’t I see the Booklaunch meta box on my page edit screen?

  • Make sure your theme meets this plugin’s requirements.
  • Make sure the Booklaunch Options are toggled on in the editor’s “Screen Options” tab.

Why don’t I see “Booklaunch Page” dropdown?

Make sure to update your Booklaunch plugin from the WordPress dashboard. WordPress 4.7+ is not compatible with old versions of this plugin.

short_description: This is a Wordpress plugin for Premium Booklaunch users that lets you display your Booklaunch.io page as a page template on your Wordpress website.
